import { memo, useState } from 'react' import Order from '../../images/order.png' import Detail from '../../images/detail.png' import Payment from '../../images/payment.png' import { english, vietnamese } from '../../Languages/BookingTour' import './BookingTour.scss' function BookingTour({ languageSelected }) { const [optionSelected, setOptionSelected] = useState(0) const languageList = (languageSelected === 'EN' ? english : vietnamese) return (
setOptionSelected(0)} className='item-tag-booking-tour'>
{languageList.txtTag1}
setOptionSelected(40)} className='item-tag-booking-tour'> = 40 && 'step-booking'}`} />
{languageList.txtTag2}
setOptionSelected(80)} className='item-tag-booking-tour'>
{languageList.txtTag3}
) } export default memo(BookingTour)
